QuestData.Title: Totems, Totems, Totems!
QuestData.Description: <This totem pulses with energy, releasing it into the nearby idols and thorns.$b$bIt looks rather fragile... It would be a shame if something happened to it.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy the Brambleguard Totems in Briarback Kraul.
QuestData.RewardText: Good idea! Smashing those will distract their mystics and set back their expansion.
